game.description: Retrieve the ancient scrolls from the long-abandoned ruins of Eldarath.
game.objective: Discover the secrets of the ancient civilization that once flourished in Eldarath.
game.reward: A magical scroll with a powerful spell and a boost to reputation with the local villagers

tasks.description: Explore the eastern part of the ruins and locate the entrance to the ancient library.
tasks.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the library

tasks.description: Navigate the treacherous tunnels and retrieve a copy of the ancient Scroll of Eldarath.
tasks.objective: Retrieve a scroll from the shelves without triggering any traps or alarms

tasks.description: Return to Eilif Stonefist with the retrieved scroll and share your findings.
tasks.location: Village of Oakwood, near the ancient ruins
tasks.objective: Share the information about Eldarath's ancient civilization with the village elder

game.title: The Lost Scrolls of Eldarath
